step1.title: Create and validate your first billing profile
step1.description: To be able to receive rewards you need to validate a billing profile.

step2.title: Add and validate a company billing profile
step2.description: To be able to receive more than $5k per year you need a company.

step3.title: Update your description
step3.description: To showcase who you are and why your the perfect contributor.

step4.title: Update your Telegram contact information
step4.description: You can control who has access to this information.

step5.title: Get your first reward
step5.description: Contribute on a project, create value and get your first reward.

step6.title: Request your rewards
step6.description: To receive the reward on your wallets you need to request the payment.

public.subtitle: Sign-up and create your account
public.description: Get access to more than 200 projects to contribute to.

learnMore.title: Learn more about Onlydust
learnMore.subtitle: “I don’t know where to start.” Sound familiar? Read on.
learnMore.description: When asking contributors what the most challenging thing for them was when starting out on their open source journey, we started to notice some common frustrations that many have faced at some point or another.
